src_original: oṃ sarvapāpānapanaya huṃ /  ekaṃ śirasi nyasedanena mantreṇa - oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca huṃ 2 phaṭ svāhā /
dānaṃ gomayambunā ca sahitaṃ śīlaṃ ca sammārjanaṃ  kṣāntiṃ kṣudrapipīlikāpanayanaṃ vīryaṃ kriyāsthāpanam /
etāḥ pāramitā ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam //
puṣpaikaṃ hastasyopari nyasya nyubjahastaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍale kṣipet /
oṃ namo bhagavate puṣpaketurājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
tadyathā - oṃ puṣpe 2 mahāpuṣpe supuṣpe puṣpodbhave puṣpasaṃbhave puṣpāvakiraṇe svāhā /
